Name: Sidewalk litter exemption on holidays during which alternate side parking is suspended.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a sidewalk litter exemption on holidays during which alternate side parking is suspended.
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Subdivision 2 of section 16-118 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new paragraph c to read as follows:
	(c) This subdivision shall not apply on holidays on which alternate side of the street parking rules have been suspended pursuant to section 19-163 of the code.
	Â§2. This local law shall take effect thirty days after its enactment.
